Class DNAString

  • java.lang.Object
    • DNAString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence

    public final class DNAString
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.CharSequence
    Immutable class for DNA sequences.

      • reverseComplement

        public DNAString reverseComplement()
        Compute reverse complement of DNA sequence.
        Returns:
        DNAString of reverse complement.

      • allVariations

        public DNAString[] allVariations(int pos)
        Compute all variations at given position. If pos is outside of sequence array, return extensions.
        Parameters:
        pos - position index.
        Returns:
        DNAString array containing variations of sequence at position pos.

      • replaceCharAt

        public DNAString replaceCharAt(int pos,
                               byte replacement)
        Creates a new DNAString where the base at position pos will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        pos - replacement index.
        replacement - replacement base.

      • concat

        public DNAString concat(DNAString s)
        Concatenates the specified string to the end of this string.

        If the length of the argument string is 0, then this DNAString object is returned. Otherwise, a new DNAString object is created, representing a byte sequence that is the concatenation of the byte sequence represented by this DNAString object and the byte sequence represented by the argument DNAString.

        Parameters:
        s - the DNAString that will will be concatenated to the end of this DNString.
        Returns:
        a new DNAString object representing the sequence of this DNAString followed by the sequence of the argument's sequence.

      • byteAt

        public byte byteAt(int pos)
        Returns the byte representation of the base at position pos.
        Parameters:
        pos - position to evaluate.
        Returns:
        char representation of byte at position pos.

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Returns the underlying byte sequence.
        Returns:
        byte sequence of this DNAString.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compare this DNAString to the given object. Two DNAStrings are equal if their byte sequences are the same.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an Object to compare to this DNAString.
        Returns:
        true if the object is a DNAString object with the same byte sequence.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns a hash code for this string. The hash code for a DNAString object is computed in the same way as for a regular String object:

        s[0]*31^(n-1) + s[1]*31^(n-2) + ... + s[n-1]

        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a hash code for this DNAString.

      • length

        public int length()
        Returns length of this DNAString
        Specified by:
        length in interface java.lang.CharSequence
        Returns:
        length of the byte array containing the bases of this DNAString.

      • subSequence

        public DNAString subSequence(int from,
                             int to)
        Returns a new DNAString representing a subsequence of this DNAString.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        from - the begin index, inclusive.
        to - the end index, exclusive.
